mapper.insert:
insert into supplier_operation_log
id,
object_id,
handle_type,
object_type,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
del_flag,
content,
handle_name,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{objectType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT object_id as objectId,handle_type as handleType,object_type as objectType, content,create_time as createTime,create_by as createBy,handle_name as handleName FROM supplier_operation_log WHERE del_flag=0 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into supplier_operation_log (id, object_id, handle_type, object_type, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, del_flag, content, handle_name,remark ) values
( #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.handleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.objectType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.handleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
